00042 static void
00043 reshape(int width, int height)
00044 {
00045         GLfloat h = (GLfloat) height / (GLfloat) width;
00046 
00047         glViewport(0, 0, (GLint) width, (GLint) height);
00048         glutPostRedisplay();

00052 static void usage(const char *s) {
00053         cerr << "usage:\n" << s
00054                         << "[-m <model image>] [-r]\n"
00055                         "       -m      specifies model image\n"
00056                         "       -r      do not load any data\n"
00057                         "       -t      train a new classifier\n"
00058                         "       -g      recompute geometric calibration\n"
00059                         "       -l      rebuild irradiance map from scratch\n";
00060         exit(1);
00061 }

00071 static bool init( int argc, char** argv )
00072 {
00073         bool redo_geom=false;
00074         bool redo_training=false;
00075         bool redo_lighting=false;
00076 
00077         char *modelFile = "model.bmp";
00078         // parse command line
00079         for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00080                 if (strcmp(argv[i], "-m") ==0) {
00081                         if (i==argc-1) usage(argv[0]);
00082                         modelFile = argv[i+1];
00083                         i++;
00084                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-r")==0) {
00085                         redo_geom=redo_training=redo_lighting=true;
00086                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-g")==0) {
00087                         redo_geom=redo_lighting=true;
00088                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-l")==0) {
00089                         redo_lighting=true;
00090                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-t")==0) {
00091                         redo_training=true;
00092                 } else if (argv[i][0]=='-') {
00093                         usage(argv[0]);
00094                 } 
00095         }
00096 
00097         cacheLight = !redo_lighting;
00098 
00099         multi = new MultiGrab(modelFile);
00100 
00101         if( multi->init(!redo_training) ==0 )
00102         {
00103                 cerr <<"Initialization error.\n";
00104                 return false;
00105         }
00106 
00107         geom_calib_start(!redo_geom);
00108 
00109         return true;
00110 }

00117 static void keyboard(unsigned char c, int x, int y)
00118 {
00119         switch (c) {
00120                 case 'n' :
00121                 case '+' : if (current_cam < multi->cams.size()-1) 
00122                                    current_cam++;
00123                            break;
00124                 case 'p':
00125                 case '-': if (current_cam >= 1) 
00126                                   current_cam--;
00127                           break;
00128                 case 'q': exit(0); break;
00129                 case 'd': dynamicLight = !dynamicLight; break;
00130                 case 'o': sphereObject = !sphereObject; break;
00131                 case 'f': glutFullScreen(); break;
00132         }
00133         glutPostRedisplay();
00134 }

00140 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00141 {
00142 
00143         glutInit(&argc, argv);
00144         glutInitDisplayMode(GLUT_RGB | GLUT_DEPTH | GLUT_DOUBLE);
00145 
00146         glutCreateWindow("Multi-Cam Teapot augmentation");
00147         glutDisplayFunc(emptyWindow);
00148 
00149         if (!init(argc,argv)) return -1;
00150 
00151         cvDestroyAllWindows();
00152 
00153         glutKeyboardFunc(keyboard);
00154         glutMainLoop();
00155         return 0;             /* ANSI C requires main to return int. */
00156 }

00159 static bool drawBackground(IplTexture *tex)
00160 {
00161         if (!tex || !tex->getIm()) return false;
00162 
00163         IplImage *im = tex->getIm();
00164         int w = im->width-1;
00165         int h = im->height-1;
00166 
00167         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00168         glLoadIdentity();
00169         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00170         glLoadIdentity();
00171 
00172         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00173         glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00174 
00175         tex->loadTexture();
00176 
00177         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00178         glColor4f(1,1,1,1);
00179 
00180         glTexCoord2f(tex->u(0), tex->v(0));
00181         glVertex2f(-1, 1);
00182 
00183         glTexCoord2f(tex->u(w), tex->v(0));
00184         glVertex2f(1, 1);
00185 
00186         glTexCoord2f(tex->u(w), tex->v(h));
00187         glVertex2f(1, -1);
00188 
00189         glTexCoord2f(tex->u(0), tex->v(h));
00190         glVertex2f(-1, -1);
00191         glEnd();
00192 
00193         tex->disableTexture();
00194 
00195         return true;
00196 }

00205 static void geom_calib_draw(void)
00206 {
00207         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00208 
00209         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00210         drawBackground(frameTexture);
00211 
00212         if (!multi) return;
00213 
00214         IplImage *im = multi->cams[current_cam]->frame;
00215         planar_object_recognizer &detector(multi->cams[current_cam]->detector);
00216         if (!im) return;
00217 
00218         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00219         glLoadIdentity();
00220         glOrtho(0, im->width-1, im->height-1, 0, -1, 1);
00221 
00222         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00223         glLoadIdentity();
00224 
00225         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00226         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00227         glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00228 
00229         if (detector.object_is_detected) {
00230 
00231                 glPointSize(2);
00232                 glBegin(GL_POINTS);
00233                 glColor4f(0,1,0,1);
00234                 for (int i=0; i<detector.match_number; ++i) {
00235 
00236                         image_object_point_match * match = detector.matches+i;
00237                         if (match->inlier) {
00238                                 int s = (int)(match->image_point->scale);
00239                                 float x=PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->u, s, 0);
00240                                 float y=PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->v, s, 0);
00241                                 glVertex2f(x,y);
00242                         }
00243                 }
00244                 glEnd();
00245         }
00246 
00247         glutSwapBuffers();
00248 }
00249 
00253 static void geom_calib_end()
00254 {
00255 
00256         if (!multi->model.augm.LoadOptimalStructureFromFile("camera_c.txt", "camera_r_t.txt")) 
00257         {
00258                 cout << "failed to load camera calibration.\n";
00259                 exit(-1);
00260         }
00261         glutIdleFunc(0);
00262         //glutDisplayFunc(0);
00263         delete calib;
00264         calib=0;
00265 }
00266 
00272 static void geom_calib_idle(void)
00273 {
00274         // acquire images
00275         multi->grabFrames();
00276 
00277         // detect the calibration object in every image
00278         // (this loop could be paralelized)
00279         int nbdet=0;
00280         for (int i=0; i<multi->cams.size(); ++i) {
00281                 if (multi->cams[i]->detect()) nbdet++;
00282         }
00283 
00284         if(!frameTexture) frameTexture = new IplTexture;
00285         frameTexture->setImage(multi->cams[current_cam]->frame);
00286 
00287         if (nbdet>0) {
00288                 for (int i=0; i<multi->cams.size(); ++i) {
00289                         if (multi->cams[i]->detector.object_is_detected) {
00290                                 add_detected_homography(i, multi->cams[i]->detector, *calib);
00291                         } else {
00292                                 calib->AddHomography(i);
00293                         }
00294                 }
00295                 geom_calib_nb_homography++;
00296         }
00297 
00298         if (geom_calib_nb_homography>=150) {
00299                 if (calib->Calibrate(
00300                                         50, // max hom
00301                                         (multi->cams.size() > 1 ? 1:2),   // padding or random
00302                                         (multi->cams.size() > 1 ? 0:3),
00303                                         1,   // padding ratio 1/2
00304                                         0,
00305                                         0,
00306                                         0.0078125,      //alpha
00307                                         0.9,            //beta
00308                                         0.001953125,//gamma
00309                                         10,       // iter
00310                                         0.05, //eps
00311                                         3   //postfilter eps
00312                                    )) 
00313                 {
00314                         calib->PrintOptimizedResultsToFile1();
00315                         geom_calib_end();
00316                         photo_start();
00317                         return;
00318                 }
00319         }
00320 
00321         glutPostRedisplay();
00322 }
00323 
00327 static void geom_calib_start(bool cache)
00328 {
00329         if (cache && multi->model.augm.LoadOptimalStructureFromFile("camera_c.txt", "camera_r_t.txt")) {
00330                 photo_start();
00331                 return;
00332         }
00333 
00334         // construct a CamCalibration object and register all the cameras
00335         calib = new CamCalibration();
00336 
00337         for (int i=0; i<multi->cams.size(); ++i) {
00338                 calib->AddCamera(multi->cams[i]->width, multi->cams[i]->height);
00339         }
00340 
00341         geom_calib_nb_homography=0;
00342         glutDisplayFunc(geom_calib_draw);
00343         glutIdleFunc(geom_calib_idle);
00344 }
00345 
00346 //#define DEBUG_SHADER
00351 static void photo_draw(void)
00352 {
00353         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00354 
00355         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00356         drawBackground(frameTexture);
00357 
00358         if (!multi) return;
00359 
00360         IplImage *im = multi->model.image;
00361         if (!im) return;
00362 
00363         if (frameOK) {
00364                 // Fetch object -> image, world->image and world -> object matrices
00365                 CvMat *proj = multi->model.augm.GetProjectionMatrix(current_cam);
00366                 CvMat *world = multi->model.augm.GetObjectToWorld();
00367 
00368                 Mat3x4 moveObject, rot, obj2World, movedRT_;
00369                 moveObject.setTranslate(im->width/2,im->height/2,-120*3/4);
00370                 rot.setRotate(Vec3(1,0,0),2*M_PI*180.0/360.0);
00371                 moveObject.mul(rot);
00372                 CvMat cvMoveObject = cvMat(3,4,CV_64FC1, moveObject.m);
00373                 CvMat movedRT=cvMat(3,4,CV_64FC1,movedRT_.m);
00374 
00375                 double a_proj[3][4];
00376                 for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00377                         for( int j = 0; j < 4; j++ ) {
00378                                 a_proj[i][j] = cvmGet( proj, i, j );
00379                                 obj2World.m[i][j] = cvmGet(world, i, j);
00380                         }
00381                 cvReleaseMat(&proj);
00382                 CamCalibration::Mat3x4Mul( world, &cvMoveObject, &movedRT);
00383 
00384                 // translate into OpenGL PROJECTION and MODELVIEW matrices
00385                 PerspectiveCamera c;
00386                 c.loadTdir(a_proj, multi->cams[current_cam]->frame->width, multi->cams[current_cam]->frame->height);
00387                 c.flip();
00388                 c.setPlanes(100,1000000);
00389                 c.setGlProjection();            
00390                 c.setGlModelView();
00391 
00392                 // fill the z-buffer for the calibration target
00393                 // by drawing a transparent polygon
00394                 glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00395                 glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00396 
00397                 glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00398                 glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00399 
00400                 glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE);
00401                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00402 
00403 #ifndef DEBUG_SHADER
00404                 // transparent back face, for z-buffer only
00405                 glColor4f(1,1,1,0);
00406                 glNormal3f(0,0,-1);
00407 
00408                 glVertex3f(multi->model.corners[0].x,multi->model.corners[0].y,0);
00409                 glVertex3f(multi->model.corners[1].x,multi->model.corners[1].y,0);
00410                 glVertex3f(multi->model.corners[2].x,multi->model.corners[2].y,0);
00411                 glVertex3f(multi->model.corners[3].x,multi->model.corners[3].y,0);
00412 
00413 #else
00414                 // we want to relight a color present on the model image
00415                 // with an irradiance coming from the irradiance map
00416                 CvScalar color = cvGet2D(multi->model.image, multi->model.image->height/2, multi->model.image->width/2);
00417                 float normal[3] = { 
00418                         obj2World.m[0][2],
00419                         obj2World.m[1][2],
00420                         obj2World.m[2][2]};
00421 
00422                 CvScalar irradiance = multi->model.map.readMap(normal);
00423 
00424                 // the camera has some gain and bias
00425                 const float *g = multi->model.map.getGain(current_cam);
00426                 const float *b = multi->model.map.getBias(current_cam);
00427 
00428                 // relight the 3 RGB channels. The bias value expects 0 black 1 white,
00429                 // but the image are stored with a white value of 255: Conversion is required.
00430                 for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00431                         color.val[i] = (g[i]*(color.val[i]/255.0)*irradiance.val[i] + b[i]);
00432                 }
00433                 glColor3d(color.val[2], color.val[1], color.val[0]);
00434 
00435                 float half[2] = {
00436                         (multi->model.corners[0].x + multi->model.corners[1].x)/2,
00437                         (multi->model.corners[2].x + multi->model.corners[3].x)/2,
00438                 };
00439                 glNormal3f(0,0,1);
00440                 glVertex3f(multi->model.corners[0].x,multi->model.corners[0].y,0);
00441                 glVertex3f(half[0],multi->model.corners[1].y,0);
00442                 glVertex3f(half[1],multi->model.corners[2].y,0);
00443                 glVertex3f(multi->model.corners[3].x,multi->model.corners[3].y,0);
00444 #endif
00445                 glEnd();
00446 
00447 #ifndef DEBUG_SHADER
00448                 // apply the object transformation matrix
00449                 Mat3x4 w2e(c.getWorldToEyeMat());
00450                 w2e.mul(moveObject);
00451                 c.setWorldToEyeMat(w2e);
00452                 c.setGlModelView();
00453 #endif
00454 
00455                 if (multi->model.map.isReady()) {
00456                         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00457 #ifdef DEBUG_SHADER
00458                         multi->model.map.enableShader(current_cam, world);
00459 #else
00460                         multi->model.map.enableShader(current_cam, &movedRT);
00461 #endif
00462                 } else {
00463                         GLfloat light_diffuse[]  = {1.0, 1, 1, 1.0};
00464                         GLfloat light_position[] = {500, 400.0, 500.0, 1};
00465                         Mat3x4 w2obj;
00466                         w2obj.setInverseByTranspose(obj2World);
00467                         w2obj.transform(light_position, light_position);
00468                         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_DIFFUSE, light_diffuse);
00469                         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_POSITION, light_position);
00470                         glEnable(GL_LIGHT0);
00471                         glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00472                 }
00473 
00474                 cvReleaseMat(&world);
00475                 {
00476                         CvScalar c =cvGet2D(multi->model.image, 
00477                                                 multi->model.image->height/2,
00478                                                         multi->model.image->width/2);
00479                         glColor3d(c.val[2], c.val[1], c.val[0]);
00480 #ifndef DEBUG_SHADER
00481                         glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE);
00482                         if (sphereObject) {
00483                                 glCullFace(GL_BACK);
00484                                 glutSolidSphere(120, 16, 16);
00485                         } else {
00486                                 glCullFace(GL_FRONT);
00487                                 // this rotation is the inverse of the rotation 
00488                                 // that glutSolidTeapot() does itself. It is necessary
00489                                 // to maintain modelView matrix consistant with the normal
00490                                 // transformation matrix.
00491                                 // scale and translation do not mess with normals: no need to worry.
00492                                 glRotatef(-270, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00493                                 glutSolidTeapot(120);
00494                         }
00495 #else   
00496                         glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE);
00497                         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00498                         glNormal3f(0,0,-1);
00499                         glVertex3f(half[0],multi->model.corners[0].y,0);
00500                         glVertex3f(multi->model.corners[1].x,multi->model.corners[1].y,0);
00501                         glVertex3f(multi->model.corners[2].x,multi->model.corners[2].y,0);
00502                         glVertex3f(half[1],multi->model.corners[3].y,0);
00503                         glEnd();
00504                         glutSolidSphere(120, 16, 16);
00505 #endif
00506                 }
00507                 if (multi->model.map.isReady())
00508                         multi->model.map.disableShader();
00509                 else
00510                         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00511         }
00512         if (multi->model.map.isReady()) {
00513                 multi->model.map.map.loadTexture();
00514                 glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00515                 glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE);
00516 
00517                 glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00518                 glLoadIdentity();
00519                 glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00520                 glLoadIdentity();
00521                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00522                 {
00523                         glColor4f(1,1,1,1);
00524                         glTexCoord2d(0,0);
00525                         glVertex2d(.5, 1);
00526                         glTexCoord2d(1,0);
00527                         glVertex2d(1,1);
00528                         glTexCoord2d(1,1);
00529                         glVertex2d(1,.8);
00530                         glTexCoord2d(0,1);
00531                         glVertex2d(.5,.8);
00532                 }
00533                 glEnd();
00534                 glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00535                 multi->model.map.map.disableTexture();
00536         }
00537 
00538 
00539         glutSwapBuffers();
00540 }
00541 
00548 static void photo_idle()
00549 {
00550         // acquire images
00551         multi->grabFrames();
00552 
00553         // detect the calibration object in every image
00554         // (this loop could be paralelized)
00555         int nbdet=0;
00556         for (int i=0; i<multi->cams.size(); ++i) {
00557                 if (multi->cams[i]->detect()) nbdet++;
00558         }
00559 
00560         if(!frameTexture) frameTexture = new IplTexture;
00561         frameTexture->setImage(multi->cams[current_cam]->frame);
00562 
00563         frameOK=false;
00564         if (nbdet>0) {
00565                 multi->model.augm.Clear();
00566                 for (int i=0; i<multi->cams.size(); ++i) {
00567                         if (multi->cams[i]->detector.object_is_detected) {
00568                                 add_detected_homography(i, multi->cams[i]->detector, multi->model.augm);
00569                         } else {
00570                                 multi->model.augm.AddHomography();
00571                         }
00572                 }
00573                 frameOK = multi->model.augm.Accomodate(4, 1e-4);
00574         }
00575 
00576         if (frameOK) {
00577                 // fetch surface normal in world coordinates
00578                 CvMat *mat = multi->model.augm.GetObjectToWorld();
00579                 float normal[3];
00580                 for (int j=0;j<3;j++) normal[j] = cvGet2D(mat, j, 2).val[0];
00581                 cvReleaseMat(&mat);
00582 
00583                 // During photometric calibration phase or 
00584                 // for light update...
00585                 if (!multi->model.map.isReady() || dynamicLight) {
00586                         for (int i=0; i<multi->cams.size();++i) {
00587                                 // ..collect lighting measures
00588                                 if (multi->cams[i]->detector.object_is_detected) {
00589                                         nbLightMeasures++;
00590                                         multi->model.map.addNormal(normal, *multi->cams[i]->lc, i);
00591                                 }
00592                         }
00593                 }
00594 
00595                 // when required, compute all the lighting parameters
00596                 if (!multi->model.map.isReady() && multi->model.map.nbNormals() > 80) {
00597                         if (multi->model.map.computeLightParams()) {
00598                                 multi->model.map.save();
00599                         }
00600                 }
00601         }
00602         glutPostRedisplay();
00603 }
00604 
00606 static void photo_start()
00607 {
00608         // allocate light collectors
00609         multi->allocLightCollector();
00610 
00611         if (cacheLight) multi->model.map.load();
00612 
00613         nbLightMeasures=0;
00614         glutIdleFunc(photo_idle);
00615         glutDisplayFunc(photo_draw);
00616 }
